code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const UserComponent=()=>{const[users,setUsers]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{axios.get('http://localhost:8080/Auth/showALL').then(response=>{setUsers(response.data);}).catch(error=>{console.error('Error fetching Users:',error);});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Users"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:users.map(user=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:user.idU}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/User/".concat(user.idU),children:user.firstName})]},user.idU))})]});};export default UserComponent;
